descripcion: Personal projects completed. Ordered from newest to oldest, thus showing my evolution in the development of each one.
sobreMi p1: Some time ago I made the decision to take a turn in my career and leave my position as a branch supervisor to pursue what truly inspires me: programming.
sobreMi p2: I am currently fully focused on my training as a developer, with a special interest in backend, which is the field that challenges me the most and motivates me to keep learning. I like to understand how things work ‚Äúunder the hood‚Äù, concentrating on the logic and structure of applications. I also have frontend knowledge and enjoy building complete projects on my own.
sobreMi p3: I recently had the opportunity to gain my first professional experience in the IT field through a temporary position, which strengthened my motivation to keep growing as a developer. I‚Äôm continuously learning, building personal projects, and refining my skills. I consider myself detail-oriented, curious, and practical ‚Äî when I don‚Äôt know how to do something, I find a way to figure it out.
sobreMi p4: My goal is to keep expanding my experience in backend development and continue growing along this path that excites me so much.
proyectoDescripcion1: Application to report and search for lost and found pets.
proyectoDescripcion2: Fullstack application for book management, including create, edit, and delete features.
proyectoDescripcion3: Task management tool built with a fullstack approach, allowing users to organize their daily activities.
proyectoDescripcion4: Web app designed for my personal use for storing recipes and organizing them into different categories for my convenience. It also has a search engine to easily find recipes by title or ingredients. It uses PWA technology so it can be use as a mobile app
